py_sim.launch.rrt_planning module¶

grid_planning.py: Provides a framework for visualization of planning using an occupancy grid

py_sim.launch.rrt_planning.path_length(x_vec: list[float], y_vec: list[float]) → float¶

Calculates the length of the path given the x and y coordinates

Inputs:

x_vec: Vector of x values y_vec: Vector of y values

Returns:

Total path length

py_sim.launch.rrt_planning.test_rrt_planner() → None¶

Plans a path in the following steps: * Create a world * Create a planner * Create the plotting * Incrementally calculate the plan until plan calculated * Calculate the plan length

Python Planning Sim
